headline: Can Church & Dwight (CHD) Balance Growth Ambitions Against Rising Input Costs?
summary: In the past week, concerns have surfaced about Church & Dwight's ability to sustain organic sales growth as rising input costs are outpacing revenue increases, prompting speculation about the need for strategic changes such as mergers and acquisitions. This development has elevated focus on the company's operational resilience and potential adjustments to its growth strategy going forward. We'll examine how pressure to accelerate growth amid cost challenges could impact Church & Dwight's...
